name: Underway (itch)
description:
You work at the famous company of Shack’s Entertainment Industries, a company that makes animatronic robots that perform at your house, rather than at a pizzeria(Which is kinda weird). 
Anyway, you have the sudden and strong urge to kill your boss, and anyone or anything that gets in your way. You(as the player) are required to go along with it and complete the task.
But beware… some of these inanimate objects might become animate...

Note: As of uploading this, this is Mattrap Games's most popular game, with over 1.3k views and 170 downloads on Gamejolt. Just an FYI.
